Description:
REST, NEST OR INVEST
Sound brick veneer ideally situated midway between the Kangaroo Flat shopping strip and Lansell Square shopping centre with childcare with medical rooms and a bus stop in between, will appeal to buyers of various ages and stages of life.
The home offers a gas-heated lounge, dining area adjoining the renovated sparkling white kitchen equipped with Emilia stainless steel gas/electric cooker, dishwasher, pantry with roll-out drawers and island breakfast bar.
Three bedrooms all include built-ins and are served by the updated bathroom with the WC off the laundry.
Added features include split system air conditioning unit, covered outdoor living area in the backyard and low-maintenance landscaping.
Outside, the approx 602m² block includes a single carport under the roofline, a dual driveway providing access to the secure backyard for caravan/ boat/trailer parking and covered outdoor living area all embraced by low-maintenance landscaping.

Description:
As New Home with Established Garden
Why build? All the hard work is completed and ready for you to just move in! This impressive four year old Cavalier Homes residence is positioned on a 651m2 allotment with side access, fully landscaped yards and quality inclusions throughout. Step through the grand double entrance and be welcomed by:
Four spacious bedrooms with built-in robes
Main bedroom featuring a large walk-in robe and ensuite with floor to ceiling tiles, double shower, double vanity and toilet
One bedroom currently used for a home business, with vinyl plank flooring and flowing straight through from the formal entry
Open plan family, dining and kitchen area with stunning white tiles
Kitchen with Caesarstone waterfall island bench, 750mm electric oven and 5 burner electric cooktop, dishwasher and walk-in pantry
Ducted gas heating and ducted evaporative cooling
Formal lounge room at the front of home
Double automatic garage with an extra built-in storeroom facility
Double gates to the side of the home, allowing ample room for a caravan/trailer/boat or alike
Fully landscaped around the entire property with a seated fire pit area and garden shed
This magnificent property showcases examples of quality finishings inside and out; be very quick to book your private inspection here!

Description:
Welcome Home
This beautifully presented, home sitting right in the heart of Kangaroo Flat, offers modern amenities with a second to none location. Comfortable with 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, 16 Graham Street, Kangaroo Flat ready for its next chapter. Situated on a great sized block with yard; perfect for the first home buyer, investor or family looking for a fresh start!
This 3 bedroom home consists of a fantastic layout, a neutral colour scheme with room to make the home your own, and a lovely, cosy living space feel as soon as you walk through the front door.
A low maintenance, luscious garden at the front provides a warm welcome, with a single carport with a garage/shed behind. The fresh colour scheme & plush new carpet make an immediate impression as you enter the premises. To the right is the 1st of the bedrooms with a wall of built-in robes that includes a vanity unit. To the left is a good-size lounge room that flows fluently into an open-plan dining & kitchen area with modern benchtops and ample storage, then on to a cool entertainers patio and an easy care lawn and garden. Back through the lounge to the hallway you are met with a great sized laundry, again, with ample storage. Following on further is an updated 3 piece bathroom, a very well sized master bedroom and finally at the back, the third and final bedroom.
The exterior includes an outbuilding that incorporates the single garage as well as 2 good-size storage rooms with an undercover storage space. Ducted heating and evaporative cooling will keep your home at optimum temperature throughout the seasons. You are within walking distance to the Kangaroo Flat Railway Station, primary and secondary schools, shops, public transport & amenities. Call the team today!
(ENOE)

STYLISH ENTERTAINER
A hop, skip and jump to Crusoe Reservoir and Lansell Square Shopping Precinct is this gem which offers modern living and a functional design at an affordable price. Features 3 spacious bedrooms, generous family area, fully appointed kitchen with stone bench tops and stainless steel appliances, large windows for natural light, separate living areas, central heating and cooling, outdoor entertaining, double garage and side access for vehicles. Make the most of nearby picturesque walking tracks which connect Kangaroo Flat to Crusoe Reservoir. Well positioned for those who commute to Melbourne. Would make a great family home, first home or investment.

Description:
SPACIOUS FAMILY HOME OVERLOOKING PARK
This impressive two-storey home sits in a quiet family friendly street, weaving around a charming park with mature trees and a playground. Conveniently located - a short walk to local shopping centres, bus stops, and Crusoe Reservoir - this property offers spacious living in an ideal location for busy families.
The flexible floor plan provides over 36 square metres of living, over two-levels. With four bedrooms, a study, and four living areas - the layout offers plenty of breakout spaces for all members of the family.
Downstairs, the front room is a well-lit quiet study, with ample shelving and display cabinets, overlooking a peaceful front garden and quiet parkland across the road.
A spacious formal living area follows, with a conveniently placed powder room opposite.
The home then opens up into an open plan kitchen; complete with walk in pantry and high quality kitchen appliances, overlooking a dining area which provides access through large windowed French doors to a decked alfresco area beyond.
A well-positioned laundry is accessed from the kitchen and another two living areas, one a theatre room, sit opposite.
These two living rooms could easily be adapted into a spacious downstairs master suite if required.
A central carpeted staircase basked in light, due to a large feature window, leads upstairs to a homely family/rumpus room, providing access to four comfortably sized bedrooms and amenities.
The master suite is impressive in both space and outlook.
Overlooking the parkland, the balcony provides unhampered views over Kangaroo Flat with enviable sunset views at dusk.
Generous walk through wardrobes and a spacious ensuite with large shower, bath, double basins & separate toilet, allows this master wing to be a place for rest and quiet refuge.
A further three bedrooms with robes, a bathroom & separate toilet, and a living area complete the second level.
The gardens are neat and well maintained with established veggie garden and fruit trees.
The alfresco area has extensive decking, an outdoor ceiling fan and sedate water feature. A shaded pergola provides somewhere comfortable to bask on those sunny days, whilst a charming cubby house adds to the family appeal.
Additional features include:
Ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling throughout
Integrated double garage with automatic door
A well camouflaged garden shed
Four separate living areas, plus study
Master suite balcony
Opposite parkland with playground, walking tracks & sporting amenities.
Sitting in a quiet family friendly location close to schools and all amenities, this large family home with a flexible floor plan, offers convenient living beside a charming playground and park.
Internal area
36m²

Description:
Retire and Relax
This low maintenance two bedroom unit is in a well established, friendly community only minutes to Kangaroo Flat shopping precinct. This residential community village offers independent, pet-friendly living with the opportunity to downsize and either stay very active or just put your feet up and relax.
Offering spacious, open plan kitchen / dining / lounge with large kitchen bench, pantry, gas upright stove, split system heating and cooling plus a bonus gas space heater in the lounge area. Built-in robes in both bedrooms, private access to your own carport and undercover alfresco area with garden shed for extra storage. The rear yard provides ample room for your vegetable garden.
This unit is currently vacant - just ready to move straight in. Call to make an inspection time today!

Description:
PERFECT SIZE piece of land Ideal For Retirees
Price has been reduced to sell! Contact now, don't miss out.
Place your brand new home here & enjoy almost no maintenance. Better still, this block is hidden to the rear, perfect for safety and security. Lap up the benefit of this piece of land being one of the last blocks in this position to be sold & priced right. All of the infrastructure to the development has been completed, fully fenced. Footpaths & night lighting ideal for walks; this position offers a walking track and beautiful bird life right opposite which feels very peaceful and not like you are living in town but with the convenience of being only a 5 min drive to Lansell Square.
Contact Rod Jones 0428 444 882

Description:
SIMPLY STUNNING!!
* Quality built beautiful home situated on the top of Byambee Rise Estate with breathtaking views.
* Impressive entrance with double doors.
* Main bedroom, with large walk in robe, ensuite with double basins, ample storage and double shower.
* Guest bedroom has own ensuite and walk in robe. Other two bedrooms have walk in robes and direct access to balcony.
* Theatre room is of generous size and consists of projector/screen and boasts a fully wired surround sound system.
* The Caesar Stone open plan kitchen overlooks the dining area and features a brand new oven, walk in pantry, ample self-closing draws and a large bench that could fit the whole family around for breakfast.
* Spacious and light filled family room is inviting with a gas log fire.
* Separate living upstairs, overlooks the large balcony and stunning views of Bendigo.
* Ducted heating and refrigerated cooling throughout.
* Outside is something special, it has a resort feel. The undercover entertaining area hosts a built in BBQ, fridge and stainless steel sink, bench top and very funky ceiling fans.
* The 9.5m x 4m in-ground salt water, self-cleaning pool is heated by a new heat pump and is made secure with attractive glass panels.
* The pool house features its own bathroom, entertainment system, small kitchen, split system, ceiling fan and lounge area. This area is perfect for those lazy days by the pool or entertaining family and friends.
* An additional entertaining area has a shade sail and is close to the kiddies cubby house and beautiful lawned area.
* A shed that is any man's dream, tiled floors, power and extra storage section at the end.
* Solar panels 6.3kw & 5kw inverter.
* The property overlooks the bush at the back and provides the peace and calm feel for our busy lives.
* An impressive property you can just move in, sit back and relax with nothing to be done. This truly is a magnificent home and lifestyle.

Description:
RETIRE IN FRIENDLY ROSEDALE!
Looking to downsize and enjoy life? Located in the friendly and secure Rosedale residential village, this lovely two-bedroom villa offers very affordable and independent living, with Lansell Square shopping just across the road and public transport nearby.
With a spacious open plan kitchen/living/dining, the kitchen comprises electric appliances, ample bench space and storage. The main and second bedrooms boast walk-in robes, while the study could double as a third guest bedroom. The comfortable sized bathroom is nearby the separate toilet.
While away the afternoon with a cuppa or a book on your full width front verandah or just chat with the neighbours. Year round comfort is taken care of with ceiling fans in both bedrooms, ducted heating and reverse cycle split/system air conditioning. With plenty of linen storage and private access to your private alfresco area, garden shed, carport and clothesline, this one is a must to inspect!
Features:
- Built-in wardrobes
- Close to transport
- Close to shops
- Pets allowed
- Security access
- Split system heating
- Split system cooling
- Ducted heating
- Outdoor entertaining
- Gas hot water service
- Lifestyle property

Description:
RETIRE IN STYLE AND COMFORT
If you or a treasured family member are looking to downsize and enjoy a relaxed lifestyle in a friendly and supportive community, this stunning one year old two-bedroom villa, located in the Aviva Residential Village, offers affordable, secure, independent living with nearby bus stop and Lansell Square shopping just down the road.
The modern kitchen includes ample work space and storage with as-new stainless steel wall oven, gas cooktop, dishwasher and microwave. The spacious open plan lounge/dining area includes a handy study nook ensuring everything has its place, beautiful timber flooring is a minimum of fuss to clean. Year-round comfort is taken care of with ceiling fans in both bedrooms, reverse cycle heating/cooling and ducted gas heating along with wall, floor and ceiling insulation. The master bedroom boasts walk-in wardrobe with built-in shelving, with built-in robes in the second bedroom. A comfortable bathroom includes oversized shower, double vanity and ample under-bench storage.
The laundry offers ample linen storage and oversize bench, private access to your long auto roller door carport space with room for two small cars - or one car and the spacious covered alfresco area, garden shed and clothesline, or you can relax the afternoon away on your own sun lled front deck.
The village features a bowling green, cinema, swimming pool, gym, community garden, bar and lounges, a letterbox at the Clubhouse and much more. Enjoy a relaxed, low maintenance lifestyle amid friendly neighbours and all the facilities the Village has to offer. This one is a must to inspect.
Features:
- Built-in wardrobes
- Close to transport
- Close to shops
- Pets allowed
- Security access
- Roller door access
- Split system heating
- Split system cooling
- Ducted heating
- Walk-in robe
- Dishwasher
- Outdoor entertaining
- Gas hot water service
- Window furnishings
- Lifestyle property
DIRECTIONS: (see map in photos) Unit 171 is tucked away in the quieter area at the rear of the village. Upon entering the gate on Furness Street, stay to your right and continue all the way along Botanic Drive and turn left at the end. Unit 171 is half way along on the left. Give us a call if you need any assistance.

Description:
Stylish Modern Living and Convenience
Situated only 950m from Lansell Square Shopping Centre, in the very popular Byambee Rises Estate, is this beautifully presented residence which is set on an elevated allotment, offering a lifestyle of convenient living.
Spacious floorplan comprises 4 bedrooms including main with WIR and ensuite, large open plan kitchen/meals and living area, undercover outdoor entertaining, double garage, plus separate bathroom/laundry facilities.
Year round comfort is provided with gas ducted heating throughout, and split system reverse cycle air-conditioning.
Appealing features include modern kitchen with gas cooking and stainless steel appliances. Tasteful colour schemes and inclusions are presented throughout the residence.
Secure rear yard offers a lawn area that is sure to be well utilised by children and/or pets, whilst in a safe environment with excellent visibility from the kitchen/meals area.
Easy access to Rocklea Homemaker Centre, specialty shops, schools, public transport and recreational facilities. Whether it be for investment or setting up your new home, this property has a lot of attractive qualities and a price range that will appeal to many.

Description:
Well Presented
This very affordable two bedroom unit is nested in the heart of Rosedale Residential Village, offering independent living with nearby bus stop and Lansell Square shopping. Entering from the front porch you are greeted with a open plan lounge /dining area that adjoins the kitchen with good storage space and full cooking facilities. Both bedrooms have built-in-robes and nearby open bathroom, laundry and toilet, bathroom features a large shower with single vanity. It has underfloor ducted gas heater for those cold winter days and a reverse cycle split system to keep you free from the heat of summer. This unit is ideal for someone that likes to potter in the garden, and comes with garden shed to store all your bits and pieces.
This well priced unit wont last and vendors are keen to sell - contact Kaylene Disher 0431 039 512.

Description:
Enjoy Life & Downsize with Low Maintenance
Located within the Rosedale Village community, this beautifully presented home is only minutes to the Kangaroo Flat Shopping Precinct. This unit is located immediately at the front of the village, in a fantastic spot, with neighbours only on one side.
Comprising two bedrooms, both have built-in robes, open plan kitchen / dining and living areas are light- filled with the kitchen being well- equipped with a gas upright stove, over head cupboards, breakfast bar, good size pantry and plenty of storage. Other great features include new split- system heating and cooling, new hot water system, as-new carpet and freshly painted inside. Light filled bathroom, laundry with separate toilet. Outside is a two car carport with garden shed for that extra storage.
Downsize in comfort in this very well established, friendly community - you will love it! Call for an inspection today.

Description:
Elegant Family Home With Brand New Updates Throughout!
Elegant, luxurious, fresh, spacious, these are just some of the words that come to mind when you step inside this magnificently presented 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom, 2 living spaces family home.
You can tell this home was built to the highest of standards because although it's not brand new, it still has that feel. Displaying superior fittings and fixtures throughout, most of which are actually brand new. The home has just been fitted with brand new carpet throughout, brand new day/night blinds on every window, security doors, brand new ducted cooling and ducted heating. The kitchen has got a brand new gas stove/oven, new Miele dishwasher and there's also a solar gas booster.
Accommodation comprises of three wonderfully bright bedrooms, including the gorgeous master bedroom which comes complete with built-in robes and a full ensuite featuring a large shower, single vanity and a separate WC. The remaining bedrooms also have built-in robes and have the new modern-day/night blinds with a pelmet for added class. The second bathroom is nice and big and offers a bathtub you can soak in on a cold winters night.
Outside you'll be pleased to find the huge pergola with a painted concrete floor, concreted shed and side access. This quiet street is ideally situated close to a primary school, daycare centre and a high school also just a short distance away. In terms of amenities, you're a stone's throw to an ALDI and IGA supermarket, dog parks, bike trails, V-Line (to Melbourne) train station and Lansell Shopping Centre (Bunnings, K-mart, Woolworths and more).
This home oozes class from start to finish and presents so beautifully you'll want to move straight in. It's even more impressive in person, inspection is a must.

Description:
CONTEMPORARY TOWNHOUSE IDEAL INVESTMENT OR DOWNSIZE OPPORTUNITY
Within easy access to Dower Park and the newly developed Kangaroo Flat Sports Club is this contemporary and surprisingly spacious townhouse. One of four on a spacious allotment, the private home is walking distance to bus stops and all the amenities of Kangaroo Flat including schools, shops, banks and pharmacy.
The front door opens into a very sizable open plan living, kitchen and dining room. This lovely light-filled area offers secure access to the double garage, an oversized space that also includes a neat laundry and workshop area. The galley kitchen in the main living area enjoys good storage and quality appliances.
Off the main entrance and the living room is the master bedroom. A walk-in robe and modern ensuite provide an excellent space and two further bedrooms, both with built-in robes can be accessed off a hallway. This area also includes a family bathroom and separate toilet.
Glass sliding doors from the dining area lead up to sunny courtyard with built-in seating and plenty of space for a BBQ and dining area. The courtyard can also be accessed via a door from the garage. A low maintenance yard leads around the rear and side of the fully detached home.
Additional features include:
Split system heating and cooling
Modern kitchen appliances including four-burner gas cooktop, oven and dishwasher
Good storage throughout
Secure access from double garage to living area
Extended garage with designated laundry and workshop space
Low-maintenance yard
With existing tenants currently residing in this beautifully presented property, there is an excellent opportunity for an investor to secure a quality rental with a very reasonable return. Alternatively, this is an ideal home for a downsizer looking to live in an easy-care home close to all amenities.
